login.title: Login
login.loginFail: Login failed, please check if the username and token are correct

createUser.title: Create Tabby Sync Unofficial User
createUser.description: Please keep your token safe, it will only be displayed in plain text once
createUser.createAccountError: User creation failed, please check the username input

exportConfigs.title: Export Configurations
exportConfigs.description: Export configurations as a JSON file, please keep it safe
exportConfigs.exportFail: Configuration export failed, please check your network connection

importConfigs.title: Import Configurations
importConfigs.description: Import JSON configuration file into Tabby Sync
importConfigs.importFail: Configuration import failed, please check your network connection or the JSON file format
importConfigs.fileUploaderTips: Click to upload or drag and drop files here
importConfigs.contentFormatError: File content format error, please check the JSON file format

deleteUser.title: Delete Personal User
deleteUser.description: Delete your personal account and all associated configurations
deleteUser.alertDescription: Deleting your personal account is a high-risk operation, please export and backup your configurations before proceeding. Once deleted, it cannot be recovered
deleteUser.deleteFail: User deletion failed, please check your network connection or token
deleteUser.tokenErrorDescription: Token error, please check if the token is correct

rotateToken.title: Rotate Token
rotateToken.description: Change to a new token and re-encrypt the configuration files with the new token
rotateToken.alertDescription: Rotating the token is a high-risk operation, please export and backup your configurations before proceeding
rotateToken.rotateFail: Token rotation failed, please check your network connection or token
rotateToken.tokenErrorDescription: Token error, please check if the token is correct
rotateToken.backupConfigsFail: Configuration file backup failed, please check your network connection or token
rotateToken.patchUserFail: User token update failed, please check your network connection or token

getConfigs.getConfigsFail: Failed to retrieve configurations, please check your network connection or token

deleteConfigs.deleteConfigsFail: Failed to delete configurations, please check your network connection or token

downloadConfigs.downloadConfigsFail: Failed to download configurations, please check your network connection or token
